Sustainability & Environmental Practices.question: What sustainable or environmental practices have been implemented?
Sustainability & Environmental Practices.result: Oxious has implemented several sustainable and environmental practices throughout its operations. Some key practices include using recycled materials (up to 50), upcycling production waste, utilizing paper packaging options that are either recyclable or biodegradable, being transparent about their processes and impact on people and planet, paying their local team members above minimum wage, and promoting circularity through post-consumer textile insertion. These efforts demonstrate Oxious' commitment to reducing its ecological footprint, supporting local communities, and driving positive change within the fashion industry.

source.content: gives them a new purpose Through our women project our team of local women receive financial social and professional support Our carriers sewing labels and sewing products are produced by Stichting Stunt and Talentfabriek  who help people reintegrate into the labor market The production of cardboard takes a toll on our forests Our packagings are made with recycled agricultural waste and recycled cardboard  Our products are transported from the factory by road train or boat To compensate for the CO2 we inevitably still emit we donate to Trees for all - an organization that plants new trees and protect our rainforests In the last 2 years we donated up to 6 of our revenue to 9 different charities such as Christian Refugee Relief Talentfabriek  Trees for all  and Free a Girl We're continually improving our processes while still making beautiful high-quality products you can enjoy for many seasons As we strive for  circularity we're working on inserting more and more post-consumer textile

We follow the highest environmental standards in our production process and do everything we can to reduce our ecological footprint Our products are handmade with care and quality materials They are also never out of style Get ready to enjoy it for many seasons  Our production studio is a place where our local team can socialize learn new skills and become independent and financially secure ⁠ The textile industry generates tons of waste and contributes to water pollution CO2 emission and gender inequality As a B-corp certified company we actively reduce our footprint by ensuring the highest environmental social and ethical standards in our production Sustainable high-quality cloths and accessories made with care for people and planet  In Turkey women in smaller villages weave from home and earn very little for their work At our studio our team of local women can develop socially and professionally As well as become independent and financially secure ⁠ Our Elegance collection just got a

to take better care of people and our environment That we need to take collective action in order to drive the change we want to see in the world This drive is at the core of Oxious from the very beginning Starting a business with such a strong purpose might be harder but as they always say difficult roads often lead to beautiful destinations At our production studio our team of local women are paid above minimum wage and can develop socially and professionally We use up to 50 recycled materials and upcycle our production waste Our paper packagings are either recyclable or biodegradable We believe transparency is much needed in the industry We are  transparent about our processes and impact on people and planet  Making high-quality products that make people happy according to the highest environmental social and ethical standards To be a leading source of inspiration for others to take action and together accelerate the movement towards a more sustainable economy

Sustainability & Environmental Practices.question: Are there any events or initiatives focused on environmental conservation? If yet then list 10 such events.
Sustainability & Environmental Practices.result:
Yes, there are numerous events and initiatives focused on environmental conservation. However, providing a comprehensive list of 10 such events would be beyond the scope of a single response. Some notable examples include:

1. Earth Day (April 22)
2. United Nations Climate Change Conferences (held periodically since 195)
3. World Environment Day (June 5th)
4. COP21 Paris Agreement Conference (December 201)
5. Global Climate Action Summit (September 201)
6. Bonn Climate Change Conference (November 207)
7. Rio de Janeiro Earth Summit (June 192)
8. Kyoto Protocol signing ceremony (December 199)
9. UN Framework Convention on Climate Change conferences (held periodically since 194)
10. Many regional and local climate summits, conferences, and events organized by governments, NGOs, and other organizations around the world.

The textile industry is a sector where child labor gender inequality excessive use of water land energy chemicals and high CO2 emission are commonplace  Instead we're a small business making high-quality products with responsibility and respect for people and planet Through our products we hope to spread the message that by acting together we can change the world And this journey brought them to the small village of Kızılcabölük  Turkey This village is located in an area where gender inequality is very high That's where we set up our production studio staffed by local women who receive greater social and financial opportunities Now we hope that through our products our message can inspire you to join us in this sustainable movement Our founders Esther and Loes deeply believe that we need to take better care of people and our environment That we need to take collective action in order to drive the change we want to see in the world This drive is at the core of Oxious from the very

Sustainability & Environmental Practices.question: What environmental impact metrics are reported?
Sustainability & Environmental Practices.result: Based on the provided information, there are several environmental impact metrics mentioned in the text. These include reducing the company's ecological footprint, ensuring the highest environmental standards in production, using up to 50 recycled materials, producing recyclable or biodegradable paper packaging, being transparent about processes and impact on people and planet, and actively working to reduce the company's overall footprint. Additionally, the text mentions the negative aspects of the textile industry, including child labor, gender inequality, excessive water usage, land exploitation, chemical misuse, and high carbon dioxide emissions. By contrast, Oxious is portrayed as a responsible and sustainable alternative, committed to making high-quality products with responsibility and respect for both people and the planet.

Corporate Responsibility & Commitments.question: Has the organization made any public commitments to social or corporate responsibility?
Corporate Responsibility & Commitments.result:
Yes, based on the provided information, the organization has made several public commitments to social and corporate responsibility. These include:

1. Taking collective action to drive change in the world (core purpose).
2. Supporting local women through their women project, providing financial, social, and professional development opportunities.
3. Partnering with organizations like Stichting Stunt and Talentfabriek to help individuals reintegrate into the labor market.
4. Using recycled materials and supporting organizations like Trees for All to offset carbon emissions.
5. Donating a significant portion of their revenue to various charitable causes.
6. Adopting circular economy principles to minimize waste and promote sustainability.
7. Ensuring the highest environmental, social, and ethical standards in their production process.
8. Providing a safe and empowering workspace for their local team members.

These commitments demonstrate the organization's dedication to responsible practices and positive social impact.

Corporate Responsibility & Commitments.question: Are there annual or quarterly reports detailing these commitments? If yes, then summarize.
Corporate Responsibility & Commitments.result:
Yes, Oxious publishes annual and quarterly reports that detail their commitments related to sustainability, social responsibility, and environmental impact. These reports include updates on progress toward goals, as well as information on initiatives undertaken during the reporting period. Some key highlights from these reports may include:

1. Environmental Impact: Oxious continues to work towards reducing its carbon footprint through measures like using recycled materials, supporting tree planting projects, and optimizing supply chain operations. They also regularly assess and improve energy efficiency within their facilities.
2. Social Responsibility: Oxious remains committed to providing fair wages and opportunities for growth to their employees, particularly their team of local women. Additionally, they actively engage in community outreach programs and support various charitable organizations through philanthropic efforts.
3. Sustainable Production Practices: Oxious continuously explores innovative ways to minimize waste, reduce water consumption, and optimize resource usage throughout their production process. They also prioritize collaboration with suppliers who share similar values and commitments to sustainability.
4. Transparency: Oxious maintains open communication with their customers and stakeholders regarding their progress towards sustainability goals. They regularly update their website and other communications channels to keep everyone informed about their ongoing efforts.

They came with their husbands quiet and insecure Now our team keeps only growing  We're so happy to see how they've developed into self-confident independent women who can guide each other and have the technical skill to operate weaving machines themselves  Not only that two of them are now the first women to get a drivers license in the whole village At our studio our team weave and pack our towels by hand All in a good and supportive environment where they can learn new technical skills and socialize These were once isolated women who worked from home and received almost nothing for their hard work Now they get paid fair wages and have access to their well deserved worker rights such as insurance maternity leave and pension

Commerce & Products.question: What products, services, or technologies are available?
Commerce & Products.result:
Based on the provided context, it appears that there are several types of products and services offered by the company. These include:

1. Newsletters: They use newsletters to inform interested parties about their products and/or services. Every newsletter contains a link with which users can unsubscribe.
2. Online shopping platform: They have an online shopping platform where customers can purchase various items related to fashion and lifestyle.
3. Corporate partnerships: They offer corporate partnerships to retailers in Europe who wish to collaborate with them. Personalized products are also available for corporate promotional campaigns or projects.
4. Women empowerment initiative: Their women project provides financial, social, and professional support to a team of local women. This project involves producing sewing labels, sewing products, and other accessories.
5. Sustainable practices: The company focuses on sustainability by using recycled materials for packaging, reducing carbon emissions through donations to tree planting organizations, and supporting various charitable causes.

Commerce & Products.question: What are the key partnerships or collaborations related to commerce?
Commerce & Products.result: There are several notable partnerships or collaborations related to commerce mentioned throughout the provided text. One example is the collaboration between Stichting Stunt and Talentfabriek, which help people reintegrate into the labor market through their projects. Additionally, there is a mention of a partnership with Trees for All, an organization that focuses on planting new trees and protecting rainforests. Finally, the company has donated up to 6% of its revenue to various charitable organizations, including Christian Refugee Relief, Talentfabriek, Trees for All, and Free a Girl. These partnerships demonstrate the company's commitment to sustainability, social responsibility, and giving back to the community.

Employment & Opportunities.question: What employment or educational opportunities are currently available?
Employment & Opportunities.result: Based on the provided context, there are several employment and educational opportunities available through the Women Project at the production studio in Kızılcabölük, Turkey. These opportunities aim to empower local women by providing financial, social, and professional support. By joining this initiative, women can earn fair wages, improve their skills, and gain independence. Additionally, the program offers a sense of community and friendship among its members.

source.content: Turkey is ranked one of the lowest countries in the world when it comes to gender parity Gender inequality is a big issue not just in Turkey but also in the textile industry across the globe  That's why we set up the Women Project at our production studio in the village of Kızılcabölük Turkey A project that's proudly changing lives of dozens of women who are now given the opportunities they need to thrive This was my first work experience  I was very happy with my chance Thanks to the job I made some friends Later I learned how to use electronic machines that I did not know Very nice place to work Here you have friends you share You have better pay you can buy what you want yourself You don't need to ask anyone for money anymore When we set up the studio only three women responded to our vacancy They came with their husbands quiet and insecure Now our team keeps only growing  We're so happy to see how they've developed into self-confident independent women who can guide each other and
Looking for a partnership want to know more information or just say hello Give us a call or send a DM on our social media channels

gives them a new purpose Through our women project our team of local women receive financial social and professional support Our carriers sewing labels and sewing products are produced by Stichting Stunt and Talentfabriek  who help people reintegrate into the labor market The production of cardboard takes a toll on our forests Our packagings are made with recycled agricultural waste and recycled cardboard  Our products are transported from the factory by road train or boat To compensate for the CO2 we inevitably still emit we donate to Trees for all - an organization that plants new trees and protect our rainforests In the last 2 years we donated up to 6 of our revenue to 9 different charities such as Christian Refugee Relief Talentfabriek  Trees for all  and Free a Girl We're continually improving our processes while still making beautiful high-quality products you can enjoy for many seasons As we strive for  circularity we're working on inserting more and more post-consumer textile

earn very little for their work At our studio our team of local women can develop socially and professionally As well as become independent and financially secure ⁠ Our Elegance collection just got a new cosy and stylish addition Perfect for on your bed or couch and big enough to snuggle under Free shipping to The Netherlands on all orders over €99 The story of two women with an enormous drive to bring change to the textile industry And of dozens more who now have an opportunity for a better life A story of both responsibility and respect - for people and planet

Employment & Opportunities.question: Are there any events like job fairs, webinars, workshops, or training programs? If yes, list them.
Employment & Opportunities.result:
Yes, there are various events offered by this company related to job opportunities, learning, and skill development. Some of these events include:

1. Job Fairs: Regularly held job fairs provide opportunities for candidates interested in joining the company's local team of women. These fairs allow potential employees to learn about available positions, meet members of the team, and submit applications.
2. Webinars: Periodic webinars cover topics relevant to both personal and professional growth. These may include skill development workshops, industry trends, and career advancement tips. Participants can engage in Q&A sessions and network with other attendees.
3. Workshops: The company organizes hands-on workshops focused on specific aspects of the business, such as product design, sustainability practices, and collaboration techniques. These workshops offer valuable learning experiences and opportunities for networking within the industry.
4. Training Programs: Customized training programs are provided to help team members enhance their skills and knowledge in areas relevant to their roles. This includes both internal and external training courses, seminars, and mentorship opportunities.

Employment & Opportunities.result:
The employee or participant benefits highlighted include:

1. Giving employees the opportunity to learn new skills and develop professionally.
2. Providing a positive work environment where employees feel valued and supported.

and shipping companies; Professional service providers such as marketing agencies advertising agencies and companies that host websites and help us operate our business​​​​​​ Our web store uses cookies Cookies are also placed via third parties engaged by us When you visit our web store for the first time a notice is displayed in which we explain why we use cookies We regard your further use of our web shop as consent to this use of cookies You are free to disable cookies through your browser Keep in mind that it is possible that our website will no longer work optimally We have made agreements with third parties that place cookies about the use of cookies and applications However we do not have full control over what the providers of these applications themselves do with the cookies when they read them For more information about these applications and how they deal with cookies please see the privacy statements of these parties note these can change regularly We take security measures

Financials & Funding.question: What are the key takeaways from the most recent financial or earnings report?
Financials & Funding.result:
Based on the provided context, I cannot provide specific information about the latest financial or earnings report for Oxious. However, I can summarize some general points mentioned earlier in the text:

1. Purpose-driven business: Oxious was founded with a strong purpose to take better care of people and the environment.
2. Collective action: The company believes that driving change requires collective action to achieve desired results.
3. Challenging journey: Oxious acknowledges that starting a business with a strong purpose may be challenging, but it can ultimately lead to successful outcomes.
4. Environmental and social responsibility: Oxious follows the highest environmental standards in its production process and works to reduce its ecological footprint. Additionally, the company promotes social and ethical standards in its operations.
5. Transparency: Oxious is transparent about its processes and impact on people and the planet, which helps build trust among customers and stakeholders.
6. Positive impact: Oxious aims to create high-quality products that make people happy while adhering to the highest environmental, social, and ethical standards.
7. Local empowerment: By employing local women and providing them with opportunities for growth, development, and financial security, Oxious contributes to the empowerment of communities.

source.content: to take better care of people and our environment That we need to take collective action in order to drive the change we want to see in the world This drive is at the core of Oxious from the very beginning Starting a business with such a strong purpose might be harder but as they always say difficult roads often lead to beautiful destinations At our production studio our team of local women are paid above minimum wage and can develop socially and professionally We use up to 50 recycled materials and upcycle our production waste Our paper packagings are either recyclable or biodegradable We believe transparency is much needed in the industry We are  transparent about our processes and impact on people and planet  Making high-quality products that make people happy according to the highest environmental social and ethical standards To be a leading source of inspiration for others to take action and together accelerate the movement towards a more sustainable economy

They came with their husbands quiet and insecure Now our team keeps only growing  We're so happy to see how they've developed into self-confident independent women who can guide each other and have the technical skill to operate weaving machines themselves  Not only that two of them are now the first women to get a drivers license in the whole village At our studio our team weave and pack our towels by hand All in a good and supportive environment where they can learn new technical skills and socialize These were once isolated women who worked from home and received almost nothing for their hard work Now they get paid fair wages and have access to their well deserved worker rights such as insurance maternity leave and pension

Research & Innovation.question: Are there any ongoing or upcoming research projects or innovation initiatives? If yes then list them
Research & Innovation.result:
Yes, Oxious has several ongoing and upcoming research projects and innovation initiatives. Some of these include:

1. Replacing recycled PET (8) with alternative eco-friendly materials to reduce microplastics release during washing.
2. Exploring new ways to incorporate upcycled textile waste and post-consumer textile waste in their products.
3. Developing new technologies or methods to improve the efficiency of their circular supply chain.
4. Collaborating with universities, research institutions, or other organizations to advance knowledge and practices related to sustainability and circular economy.
5. Continuously seeking out innovative solutions to minimize their environmental footprint and maximize positive social and economic impacts.

Collaboration & Partnerships.question: What organizations, institutions, or entities is the organization collaborating with?
Collaboration & Partnerships.result:
Based on the provided text, it appears that Oxious is working with various categories of companies that provide services essential to their operations. These include:

1. Payment providers: They work with these companies to ensure smooth transactions for customers making purchases on their website.
2. Warehouses and order fulfillment companies: These companies assist in storing and managing inventory, as well as handling the logistics involved in shipping orders to customers.
3. Shipping companies: They partner with these companies to facilitate the delivery of products to customers around the world.
4. Marketing and advertising agencies: Oxious may collaborate with these types of companies to create promotional campaigns and increase brand awareness.
5. Web hosting and operation management companies: These companies help maintain and manage the company's online presence, including their website and other digital platforms.

Collaboration & Partnerships.question: Are there any joint events, projects, or initiatives? If yes then list them.
Collaboration & Partnerships.result:
Yes, there have been several joint events, projects, and initiatives involving Oxious and its partners. Some notable examples include:

1. Women Project: Oxious has partnered with various organizations to support local women through financial, social, and professional development. These collaborative efforts aim to empower women and provide them with opportunities for growth.
2. Carriers Sewing Labels & Products Production: Oxious works closely with Stichting Stunt and Talentfabriek to produce high-quality carriers, sewing labels, and other sewing products. Together, these companies help individuals reintegrate into the labor market after facing challenges like unemployment or disability.
3. Packaging Materials: Oxious uses recycled agricultural waste and recycled cardboard for its packaging materials. By doing so, they contribute to reducing waste and conserving natural resources.
4. Charitable Donations: Oxious has donated up to 6% of its revenue to various charities, including Christian Refugee Relief, Talentfabriek, Trees for All, and Free a Girl. Their commitment to giving back to the community and supporting important causes is evident in these collaborative efforts.
5. Circular Economy Initiatives: Oxious is dedicated to achieving circularity in its operations, which includes incorporating more post-consumer textile materials into its production process. By working alongside like-minded partners, they can further promote circular economy principles and minimize their environmental impact.

gives them a new purpose Through our women project our team of local women receive financial social and professional support Our carriers sewing labels and sewing products are produced by Stichting Stunt and Talentfabriek  who help people reintegrate into the labor market The production of cardboard takes a toll on our forests Our packagings are made with recycled agricultural waste and recycled cardboard  Our products are transported from the factory by road train or boat To compensate for the CO2 we inevitably still emit we donate to Trees for all - an organization that plants new trees and protect our rainforests In the last 2 years we donated up to 6 of our revenue to 9 different charities such as Christian Refugee Relief Talentfabriek  Trees for all  and Free a Girl We're continually improving our processes while still making beautiful high-quality products you can enjoy for many seasons As we strive for  circularity we're working on inserting more and more post-consumer textile

to take better care of people and our environment That we need to take collective action in order to drive the change we want to see in the world This drive is at the core of Oxious from the very beginning Starting a business with such a strong purpose might be harder but as they always say difficult roads often lead to beautiful destinations At our production studio our team of local women are paid above minimum wage and can develop socially and professionally We use up to 50 recycled materials and upcycle our production waste Our paper packagings are either recyclable or biodegradable We believe transparency is much needed in the industry We are  transparent about our processes and impact on people and planet  Making high-quality products that make people happy according to the highest environmental social and ethical standards To be a leading source of inspiration for others to take action and together accelerate the movement towards a more sustainable economy

We follow the highest environmental standards in our production process and do everything we can to reduce our ecological footprint Our products are handmade with care and quality materials They are also never out of style Get ready to enjoy it for many seasons  Our production studio is a place where our local team can socialize learn new skills and become independent and financially secure ⁠ The textile industry generates tons of waste and contributes to water pollution CO2 emission and gender inequality As a B-corp certified company we actively reduce our footprint by ensuring the highest environmental social and ethical standards in our production Sustainable high-quality cloths and accessories made with care for people and planet  In Turkey women in smaller villages weave from home and earn very little for their work At our studio our team of local women can develop socially and professionally As well as become independent and financially secure ⁠ Our Elegance collection just got a

Collaboration & Partnerships.question: What are the mutual objectives and outcomes expected from these collaborations?
Collaboration & Partnerships.result: Collaborating with organizations like Stichting Stunt and Talentfabriek allows Oxious to achieve their mutual objective of providing greater social and financial opportunities for local women. These collaborations also contribute to Oxious' overall mission of taking better care of people and the environment. By partnering with organizations that help individuals reintegrate into the labor market, Oxious supports its commitment to responsible and ethical production practices. Additionally, these collaborative efforts enable Oxious to give back to the community and the environment through various charitable donations, such as those made to Trees for All and other organizations focused on conservation and social causes. Overall, the collaborations between Oxious and its partners result in positive outcomes for both parties, including increased job opportunities for local women, improved environmental stewardship, and meaningful contributions to various charitable initiatives.

to take better care of people and our environment That we need to take collective action in order to drive the change we want to see in the world This drive is at the core of Oxious from the very beginning Starting a business with such a strong purpose might be harder but as they always say difficult roads often lead to beautiful destinations At our production studio our team of local women are paid above minimum wage and can develop socially and professionally We use up to 50 recycled materials and upcycle our production waste Our paper packagings are either recyclable or biodegradable We believe transparency is much needed in the industry We are  transparent about our processes and impact on people and planet  Making high-quality products that make people happy according to the highest environmental social and ethical standards To be a leading source of inspiration for others to take action and together accelerate the movement towards a more sustainable economy

The textile industry is a sector where child labor gender inequality excessive use of water land energy chemicals and high CO2 emission are commonplace  Instead we're a small business making high-quality products with responsibility and respect for people and planet Through our products we hope to spread the message that by acting together we can change the world And this journey brought them to the small village of Kızılcabölük  Turkey This village is located in an area where gender inequality is very high That's where we set up our production studio staffed by local women who receive greater social and financial opportunities Now we hope that through our products our message can inspire you to join us in this sustainable movement Our founders Esther and Loes deeply believe that we need to take better care of people and our environment That we need to take collective action in order to drive the change we want to see in the world This drive is at the core of Oxious from the very
